name: Classic Pasta Pomodoro
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add chopped tomatoes, salt, pepper, and sugar. Cook for 15-20 minutes.
Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Toss the pasta with the sauce, and garnish with basil.

name: Pomodoro with a Twist
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion until translucent.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for 1 minute.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 20 minutes until thickened.
Cook penne pasta, then toss it with the sauce.

name: Vegan Pomodoro Sauce
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in chopped tomatoes, oregano, and cook for 15 minutes.
Cook fusilli pasta, then mix with the sauce.
